# -- Constraints --


# --- constraints ---
# Ensure each item is placed within box dimensions
for i in range(1, N_ITEMS + 1):
    item : Item = ITEMS[i]
    pos : X_Y_Position = x_y_positions[i]
    assert pos.x >= 0
    assert pos.y >= 0
    assert pos.x + item.width <= BOX_WIDTH
    assert pos.y + item.height <= BOX_HEIGHT
    # Ensure item is assigned to a valid box
    box_id : int = item_box_assignments[i]
    assert box_id >= 1
    assert box_id <= nr_used_boxes# -- Constraints --


# --- Auxiliary Variables ---
# No auxiliary variables needed beyond what's already defined

# --- Constraints ---
def place_items_in_boxes(
    items: Annotated[list[Item], Len(9, 9)],
    nr_used_boxes: int,
    item_box_assignments: Annotated[list[Annotated[int, Field(strict=True, ge=1, le=9)]], Len(9, 9)],
    x_y_positions: Annotated[list[X_Y_Position], Len(9, 9)]
) -> None:
    BOX_HEIGHT : int = 5
    BOX_WIDTH : int = 12
    N_ITEMS : int = 9
    
    # Ensure each item is placed within box dimensions
    for i in range(1, N_ITEMS + 1):
        item : Item = items[i]
        pos : X_Y_Position = x_y_positions[i]
        assert pos.x >= 0
        assert pos.y >= 0
        assert pos.x + item.width <= BOX_WIDTH
        assert pos.y + item.height <= BOX_HEIGHT
        
        # Ensure item is assigned to a valid box
        box_id : int = item_box_assignments[i]
        assert box_id >= 1
        assert box_id <= nr_used_boxes

place_items_in_boxes(ITEMS, nr_used_boxes, item_box_assignments, x_y_positions)# -- Constraints --


# --- Auxiliary Variables ---
# No auxiliary variables needed beyond what's already defined

# --- Constraints ---
def ensure_unique_item_box_assignment(
    items: Annotated[list[Item], Len(9, 9)],
    nr_used_boxes: int,
    item_box_assignments: Annotated[list[Annotated[int, Field(strict=True, ge=1, le=9)]], Len(9, 9)],
    x_y_positions: Annotated[list[X_Y_Position], Len(9, 9)]
) -> None:
    BOX_HEIGHT : int = 5
    BOX_WIDTH : int = 12
    N_ITEMS : int = 9
    
    # Ensure each item is placed within box dimensions
    for i in range(1, N_ITEMS + 1):
        item : Item = items[i]
        pos : X_Y_Position = x_y_positions[i]
        assert pos.x >= 0
        assert pos.y >= 0
        assert pos.x + item.width <= BOX_WIDTH
        assert pos.y + item.height <= BOX_HEIGHT
        
        # Ensure item is assigned to a valid box
        box_id : int = item_box_assignments[i]
        assert box_id >= 1
        assert box_id <= nr_used_boxes

ensure_unique_item_box_assignment(ITEMS, nr_used_boxes, item_box_assignments, x_y_positions)

def validate_box_placement(
    items: Annotated[list[Item], Len(9, 9)],
    item_box_assignments: Annotated[list[Annotated[int, Field(strict=True, ge=1, le=9)]], Len(9, 9)],
    x_y_positions: Annotated[list[X_Y_Position], Len(9, 9)]
) -> None:
    N_ITEMS : int = 9
    
    # Ensure no two items in the same box overlap
    for i in range(1, N_ITEMS + 1):
        for j in range(i + 1, N_ITEMS + 1):
            if item_box_assignments[i] == item_box_assignments[j]:
                item_i : Item = items[i]
                item_j : Item = items[j]
                pos_i : X_Y_Position = x_y_positions[i]
                pos_j : X_Y_Position = x_y_positions[j]
                
                # Check for overlap
                assert not (
                    (pos_i.x < pos_j.x + item_j.width) and 
                    (pos_j.x < pos_i.x + item_i.width) and 
                    (pos_i.y < pos_j.y + item_j.height) and 
                    (pos_j.y < pos_i.y + item_i.height)
                )

validate_box_placement(ITEMS, item_box_assignments, x_y_positions)

# --- Objects ---
Item = DSRecord({"width" : DSInt(lb=1, ub=10), "height" : DSInt(lb=1, ub=10)})
X_Y_Position = DSRecord({"x" : DSInt(lb=0, ub=12), "y" : DSInt(lb=0, ub=5)})



# --- Constants and Decision Variables ---
BOX_HEIGHT : int = 5
BOX_WIDTH : int = 12
ITEMS : DSList(length=9, elem_type=Item) = [{'name': 'item1', 'width': 4, 'height': 3}, {'name': 'item2', 'width': 1, 'height': 2}, {'name': 'item3', 'width': 5, 'height': 3}, {'name': 'item4', 'width': 4, 'height': 2}, {'name': 'item5', 'width': 1, 'height': 3}, {'name': 'item6', 'width': 5, 'height': 2}, {'name': 'item7', 'width': 9, 'height': 5}, {'name': 'item8', 'width': 3, 'height': 5}, {'name': 'item9', 'width': 5, 'height': 1}]
N_ITEMS : int = 9
nr_used_boxes : DSInt(lb=1, ub=9)
item_box_assignments : DSList(length=9, elem_type=DSInt(lb=1, ub=9))
N_ITEM_BOX_ASSIGNMENTS : int = 9
x_y_positions : DSList(length=9, elem_type=X_Y_Position)
N_X_Y_POSITIONS : int = 9


# --- objective ---
def calculate_objective(nr_used_boxes: int) -> int:
    calculated_value: int = nr_used_boxes
    return calculated_value

calculated_objective_value = calculate_objective(nr_used_boxes)
objective = calculated_objective_value

# --- constraints ---
# Ensure each item is placed within box dimensions
for i in range(1, N_ITEMS + 1):
    item : Item = ITEMS[i]
    pos : X_Y_Position = x_y_positions[i]
    assert pos.x >= 0
    assert pos.y >= 0
    assert pos.x + item.width <= BOX_WIDTH
    assert pos.y + item.height <= BOX_HEIGHT
    # Ensure item is assigned to a valid box
    box_id : int = item_box_assignments[i]
    assert box_id >= 1
    assert box_id <= nr_used_boxes

# --- Auxiliary Variables ---
# No auxiliary variables needed beyond what's already defined

# --- Constraints ---
def place_items_in_boxes(
    items: DSList(length=9, elem_type=Item),
    nr_used_boxes: int,
    item_box_assignments: DSList(length=9, elem_type=DSInt(lb=1, ub=9)),
    x_y_positions: DSList(length=9, elem_type=X_Y_Position)
) -> None:
    BOX_HEIGHT : int = 5
    BOX_WIDTH : int = 12
    N_ITEMS : int = 9
    
    # Ensure each item is placed within box dimensions
    for i in range(1, N_ITEMS + 1):
        item : Item = items[i]
        pos : X_Y_Position = x_y_positions[i]
        assert pos.x >= 0
        assert pos.y >= 0
        assert pos.x + item.width <= BOX_WIDTH
        assert pos.y + item.height <= BOX_HEIGHT
        
        # Ensure item is assigned to a valid box
        box_id : int = item_box_assignments[i]
        assert box_id >= 1
        assert box_id <= nr_used_boxes

place_items_in_boxes(ITEMS, nr_used_boxes, item_box_assignments, x_y_positions)

# --- Auxiliary Variables ---
# No auxiliary variables needed beyond what's already defined

# --- Constraints ---
def ensure_unique_item_box_assignment(
    items: DSList(length=9, elem_type=Item),
    nr_used_boxes: int,
    item_box_assignments: DSList(length=9, elem_type=DSInt(lb=1, ub=9)),
    x_y_positions: DSList(length=9, elem_type=X_Y_Position)
) -> None:
    BOX_HEIGHT : int = 5
    BOX_WIDTH : int = 12
    N_ITEMS : int = 9
    
    # Ensure each item is placed within box dimensions
    for i in range(1, N_ITEMS + 1):
        item : Item = items[i]
        pos : X_Y_Position = x_y_positions[i]
        assert pos.x >= 0
        assert pos.y >= 0
        assert pos.x + item.width <= BOX_WIDTH
        assert pos.y + item.height <= BOX_HEIGHT
        
        # Ensure item is assigned to a valid box
        box_id : int = item_box_assignments[i]
        assert box_id >= 1
        assert box_id <= nr_used_boxes

ensure_unique_item_box_assignment(ITEMS, nr_used_boxes, item_box_assignments, x_y_positions)

def validate_box_placement(
    items: DSList(length=9, elem_type=Item),
    item_box_assignments: DSList(length=9, elem_type=DSInt(lb=1, ub=9)),
    x_y_positions: DSList(length=9, elem_type=X_Y_Position)
) -> None:
    N_ITEMS : int = 9
    
    # Ensure no two items in the same box overlap
    for i in range(1, N_ITEMS + 1):
        for j in range(i + 1, N_ITEMS + 1):
            if item_box_assignments[i] == item_box_assignments[j]:
                item_i : Item = items[i]
                item_j : Item = items[j]
                pos_i : X_Y_Position = x_y_positions[i]
                pos_j : X_Y_Position = x_y_positions[j]
                
                # Check for overlap
                assert not (
                    (pos_i.x < pos_j.x + item_j.width) and 
                    (pos_j.x < pos_i.x + item_i.width) and 
                    (pos_i.y < pos_j.y + item_j.height) and 
                    (pos_j.y < pos_i.y + item_i.height)
                )

validate_box_placement(ITEMS, item_box_assignments, x_y_positions)
